generation_name.description: The generation name of the car model

year.description: The year the car was manufactured

mileage.description: The total distance the car has travelled in km

vol_engine.description: The volume of the car engine in cm³

fuel.description: The type of fuel the car uses

value_dict.Diesel: The car runs on diesel fuel
value_dict.CNG: The car runs on compressed natural gas
value_dict.LPG: The car runs on liquefied petroleum gas
value_dict.Hybrid: The car is a hybrid, running on a combination of fuel types

city.description: The city where the car is located

province.description: The province where the car is located

price.description: The price of the car in local currency

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the car, such as the make, model, generation, year, mileage, engine volume, fuel type, city, and province, please predict the price.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted price of the car is [price].

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the car, including the make, model, generation, price, mileage, engine volume, fuel type, city, and province, please predict the year of manufacture.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted year of manufacture is [year].

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automobile market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the car, such as the make, model, generation, year, price, engine volume, fuel type, city, and province, please predict the mileage.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted mileage of the car is [mileage].
